üìä git status ‚Äî Git-‡¶è ‡¶Ü‡¶™‡¶®‡¶æ‡¶∞ ‡¶Ö‡¶¨‡¶∏‡ßç‡¶•‡¶æ‡¶® ‡¶ú‡¶æ‡¶®‡ßÅ‡¶® ‚Äã

git status ‡¶ï‡¶Æ‡¶æ‡¶®‡ßç‡¶°‡¶ü‡¶ø Git ‡¶∞‡¶ø‡¶™‡ßã‡¶ú‡¶ø‡¶ü‡¶∞‡¶ø‡¶∞ ‡¶¨‡¶∞‡ßç‡¶§‡¶Æ‡¶æ‡¶® ‡¶Ö‡¶¨‡¶∏‡ßç‡¶•‡¶æ ‡¶¶‡ßá‡¶ñ‡¶æ‡¶®‡ßã‡¶∞ ‡¶ú‡¶®‡ßç‡¶Ø ‡¶¨‡ßç‡¶Ø‡¶¨‡¶π‡¶æ‡¶∞ ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶æ ‡¶π‡ßü‡•§ ‡¶è‡¶ü‡¶ø ‡¶Ü‡¶™‡¶®‡¶æ‡¶ï‡ßá ‡¶¨‡¶≤‡ßá ‡¶¶‡ßá‡ßü:

  • ‡¶ï‡ßã‡¶® ‡¶´‡¶æ‡¶á‡¶≤ ‡¶™‡¶∞‡¶ø‡¶¨‡¶∞‡ßç‡¶§‡¶ø‡¶§ ‡¶π‡ßü‡ßá‡¶õ‡ßá
  • ‡¶ï‡ßã‡¶® ‡¶´‡¶æ‡¶á‡¶≤ ‡¶∏‡ßç‡¶ü‡ßá‡¶ú ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶æ ‡¶Ü‡¶õ‡ßá
  • ‡¶ï‡ßã‡¶® ‡¶´‡¶æ‡¶á‡¶≤ ‡¶è‡¶ñ‡¶®‡¶ì ‡¶ï‡¶Æ‡¶ø‡¶ü ‡¶π‡ßü‡¶®‡¶ø
  • ‡¶ï‡ßã‡¶® ‡¶´‡¶æ‡¶á‡¶≤ untracked (‡¶®‡¶§‡ßÅ‡¶®)

‚úÖ ‡¶Æ‡ßå‡¶≤‡¶ø‡¶ï ‡¶ï‡¶Æ‡¶æ‡¶®‡ßç‡¶° ‚Äã

bash 
git status
git status

üß™ ‡¶â‡¶¶‡¶æ‡¶π‡¶∞‡¶£ ‡ßß: ‡¶∏‡¶¨‡¶ï‡¶ø‡¶õ‡ßÅ ‡¶†‡¶ø‡¶ï‡¶†‡¶æ‡¶ï ‡¶Ü‡¶õ‡ßá ‚Äã

bash 
$ git status
On branch main
nothing to commit, working tree clean
$ git status
On branch main
nothing to commit, working tree clean

üìå ‡¶Ö‡¶∞‡ßç‡¶•: ‡¶ï‡ßã‡¶® ‡¶™‡¶∞‡¶ø‡¶¨‡¶∞‡ßç‡¶§‡¶® ‡¶®‡ßá‡¶á, ‡¶∏‡¶¨‡¶ï‡¶ø‡¶õ‡ßÅ ‡¶ï‡¶Æ‡¶ø‡¶ü ‡¶π‡ßü‡ßá ‡¶ó‡ßá‡¶õ‡ßá‡•§

üß™ ‡¶â‡¶¶‡¶æ‡¶π‡¶∞‡¶£ ‡ß®: ‡¶®‡¶§‡ßÅ‡¶® ‡¶´‡¶æ‡¶á‡¶≤ ‡¶§‡ßà‡¶∞‡¶ø ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶æ ‡¶π‡ßü‡ßá‡¶õ‡ßá ‚Äã

bash 
$ touch hello.txt
$ git status
On branch main

Untracked files:
  (use "git add <file>..." to include in what will be committed)
    hello.txt

nothing added to commit but untracked files present
$ touch hello.txt
$ git status
On branch main

Untracked files:
  (use "git add <file>..." to include in what will be committed)
    hello.txt

nothing added to commit but untracked files present

üìå ‡¶Ö‡¶∞‡ßç‡¶•: hello.txt ‡¶®‡¶§‡ßÅ‡¶® ‡¶´‡¶æ‡¶á‡¶≤, Git ‡¶è‡¶ü‡¶ø ‡¶ü‡ßç‡¶∞‡ßç‡¶Ø‡¶æ‡¶ï ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶õ‡ßá ‡¶®‡¶æ‡•§

üëâ ‡¶∏‡¶Æ‡¶æ‡¶ß‡¶æ‡¶®:

bash 
git add hello.txt
git add hello.txt

üß™ ‡¶â‡¶¶‡¶æ‡¶π‡¶∞‡¶£ ‡ß©: ‡¶è‡¶ï‡¶ü‡¶ø ‡¶´‡¶æ‡¶á‡¶≤ ‡¶™‡¶∞‡¶ø‡¶¨‡¶∞‡ßç‡¶§‡¶® ‡¶π‡ßü‡ßá‡¶õ‡ßá ‚Äã

bash 
$ echo "new line" >> hello.txt
$ git status
On branch main
Changes not staged for commit:
  (use "git add <file>..." to update what will be committed)
    modified:   hello.txt
$ echo "new line" >> hello.txt
$ git status
On branch main
Changes not staged for commit:
  (use "git add <file>..." to update what will be committed)
    modified:   hello.txt

üìå ‡¶Ö‡¶∞‡ßç‡¶•: ‡¶´‡¶æ‡¶á‡¶≤‡¶ü‡¶ø ‡¶Ü‡¶ó‡ßá ‡¶ü‡ßç‡¶∞‡ßç‡¶Ø‡¶æ‡¶ï ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶æ ‡¶õ‡¶ø‡¶≤, ‡¶ï‡¶ø‡¶®‡ßç‡¶§‡ßÅ ‡¶è‡¶ñ‡¶® ‡¶®‡¶§‡ßÅ‡¶® ‡¶™‡¶∞‡¶ø‡¶¨‡¶∞‡ßç‡¶§‡¶® ‡¶π‡ßü‡ßá‡¶õ‡ßá, ‡¶Ø‡¶æ ‡¶è‡¶ñ‡¶®‡¶ì ‡¶∏‡ßç‡¶ü‡ßá‡¶ú ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶æ ‡¶π‡ßü‡¶®‡¶ø‡•§

üëâ ‡¶∏‡¶Æ‡¶æ‡¶ß‡¶æ‡¶®:

bash 
git add hello.txt
git add hello.txt

üß™ ‡¶â‡¶¶‡¶æ‡¶π‡¶∞‡¶£ ‡ß™: ‡¶∏‡ßç‡¶ü‡ßá‡¶ú ‡¶ì ‡¶Ü‡¶®‡¶∏‡ßç‡¶ü‡ßá‡¶ú ‡¶Æ‡¶ø‡¶∂‡ßç‡¶∞‡¶ø‡¶§ ‡¶Ö‡¶¨‡¶∏‡ßç‡¶•‡¶æ ‚Äã

bash 
$ git add hello.txt
$ echo "another line" >> hello.txt
$ git status
On branch main
Changes to be committed:
  (use "git restore --staged <file>..." to unstage)
    modified:   hello.txt

Changes not staged for commit:
  (use "git add <file>..." to update what will be committed)
    modified:   hello.txt
$ git add hello.txt
$ echo "another line" >> hello.txt
$ git status
On branch main
Changes to be committed:
  (use "git restore --staged <file>..." to unstage)
    modified:   hello.txt

Changes not staged for commit:
  (use "git add <file>..." to update what will be committed)
    modified:   hello.txt

üìå ‡¶Ö‡¶∞‡ßç‡¶•: ‡¶ï‡¶ø‡¶õ‡ßÅ ‡¶Ö‡¶Ç‡¶∂ ‡¶∏‡ßç‡¶ü‡ßá‡¶ú ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶æ ‡¶π‡ßü‡ßá‡¶õ‡ßá, ‡¶Ü‡¶¨‡¶æ‡¶∞ ‡¶ï‡¶ø‡¶õ‡ßÅ ‡¶Ö‡¶Ç‡¶∂ unstaged ‡¶Ü‡¶õ‡ßá‡•§

üëâ ‡¶¶‡ßá‡¶ñ‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶ö‡¶æ‡¶á‡¶≤‡ßá:

bash 
git diff hello.txt       # unstaged changes
git diff --staged        # staged changes
git diff hello.txt       # unstaged changes
git diff --staged        # staged changes

üß™ ‡¶â‡¶¶‡¶æ‡¶π‡¶∞‡¶£ ‡ß´: ‡¶Ö‡¶®‡ßá‡¶ï‡¶ó‡ßÅ‡¶≤‡ßã ‡¶´‡¶æ‡¶á‡¶≤ ‡¶®‡¶ø‡ßü‡ßá ‡¶ï‡¶æ‡¶ú ‚Äã

bash 
$ git status
On branch main
Changes not staged for commit:
    modified:   index.html
    modified:   app.js

Untracked files:
    new-script.js
$ git status
On branch main
Changes not staged for commit:
    modified:   index.html
    modified:   app.js

Untracked files:
    new-script.js

üëâ ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶£‡ßÄ‡ßü:

bash 
git add index.html app.js new-script.js
git commit -m "Updated HTML and JS, added new script"
git add index.html app.js new-script.js
git commit -m "Updated HTML and JS, added new script"

üß™ ‡¶â‡¶¶‡¶æ‡¶π‡¶∞‡¶£ ‡ß¨: ‡¶´‡¶æ‡¶á‡¶≤ ‡¶°‡¶ø‡¶≤‡¶ø‡¶ü ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶æ ‡¶π‡ßü‡ßá‡¶õ‡ßá ‚Äã

bash 
$ rm old-file.txt
$ git status
On branch main
Changes not staged for commit:
    deleted:    old-file.txt
$ rm old-file.txt
$ git status
On branch main
Changes not staged for commit:
    deleted:    old-file.txt

üëâ ‡¶∏‡ßç‡¶ü‡ßá‡¶ú ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá:

bash

# ‡¶Ö‡¶•‡¶¨‡¶æ
git rm old-file.txt
git add -u
# ‡¶Ö‡¶•‡¶¨‡¶æ
git rm old-file.txt

üß™ ‡¶â‡¶¶‡¶æ‡¶π‡¶∞‡¶£ ‡ß≠: ‡¶´‡¶æ‡¶á‡¶≤ ‡¶®‡¶æ‡¶Æ ‡¶™‡¶∞‡¶ø‡¶¨‡¶∞‡ßç‡¶§‡¶® (rename) ‚Äã

bash 
$ git mv about.html about-us.html

On branch main
Changes to be committed:
    renamed:    about.html -> about-us.html
$ git mv about.html about-us.html
$ git status
On branch main
Changes to be committed:
    renamed:    about.html -> about-us.html

üß™ ‡¶â‡¶¶‡¶æ‡¶π‡¶∞‡¶£ ‡ßÆ: .gitignore ‡¶ï‡¶æ‡¶ú ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶õ‡ßá ‡¶ï‡¶ø ‡¶®‡¶æ? ‚Äã

bash 
$ echo "node_modules/" >> .gitignore
$ mkdir node_modules
$ git status
On branch main
nothing to commit, working tree clean
$ echo "node_modules/" >> .gitignore
$ mkdir node_modules
$ git status
On branch main
nothing to commit, working tree clean

üìå ‡¶Ö‡¶∞‡ßç‡¶•: node_modules/ ‡¶´‡ßã‡¶≤‡ßç‡¶°‡¶æ‡¶∞ Git ‡¶á‡¶ó‡¶®‡ßã‡¶∞ ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶õ‡ßá‡•§

üîç git status ‡¶ï‡ßá ‡¶Ü‡¶∞‡¶ì ‡¶∏‡¶Ç‡¶ï‡ßç‡¶∑‡ßá‡¶™‡ßá ‡¶¶‡ßá‡¶ñ‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶ö‡¶æ‡¶®? ‚Äã

‡¶∏‡¶æ‡¶ú‡ßá‡¶∏‡ßç‡¶ü‡ßá‡¶° ‡¶´‡ßç‡¶≤‡ßç‡¶Ø‡¶æ‡¶ó: -s ‡¶¨‡¶æ --short ‚Äã

bash 
$ git status -s
 M index.html
?? new.txt
A  contact.html
$ git status -s
 M index.html
?? new.txt
A  contact.html
‡¶™‡ßç‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßÄ‡¶ï ‡¶Ö‡¶∞‡ßç‡¶•
M Modified (‡¶™‡¶∞‡¶ø‡¶¨‡¶∞‡ßç‡¶§‡¶ø‡¶§)
A Added (‡¶∏‡ßç‡¶ü‡ßá‡¶ú‡¶° ‡¶®‡¶§‡ßÅ‡¶® ‡¶´‡¶æ‡¶á‡¶≤)
?? Untracked file (‡¶®‡¶§‡ßÅ‡¶®)

üß† ‡¶ï‡ßá‡¶® git status ‡¶è‡¶§ ‡¶ú‡¶∞‡ßÅ‡¶∞‡¶ø? ‚Äã

  • ‡¶ï‡ßÄ ‡¶∏‡ßç‡¶ü‡ßá‡¶ú ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶æ ‡¶π‡ßü‡ßá‡¶õ‡ßá ‡¶Ü‡¶∞ ‡¶ï‡ßÄ ‡¶π‡ßü‡¶®‡¶ø ‚Äî ‡¶∏‡¶π‡¶ú‡ßá ‡¶¶‡ßá‡¶ñ‡¶æ ‡¶Ø‡¶æ‡ßü
  • ‡¶≠‡ßÅ‡¶≤ ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡ßá ‡¶ï‡¶ø‡¶õ‡ßÅ ‡¶¨‡¶æ‡¶¶ ‡¶™‡ßú‡ßá‡¶õ‡ßá ‡¶ï‡¶ø ‡¶®‡¶æ ‚Äî ‡¶¨‡ßÅ‡¶ù‡ßá ‡¶´‡ßá‡¶≤‡¶æ ‡¶Ø‡¶æ‡ßü
  • .gitignore ‡¶†‡¶ø‡¶ï ‡¶Æ‡¶§‡ßã ‡¶ï‡¶æ‡¶ú ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶õ‡ßá ‡¶ï‡¶ø ‡¶®‡¶æ ‡¶Ø‡¶æ‡¶ö‡¶æ‡¶á ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶æ ‡¶Ø‡¶æ‡ßü

üõ†Ô∏è ‡¶™‡ßç‡¶∞‡¶æ‡¶ï‡¶ü‡¶ø‡¶∏‡ßá‡¶∞ ‡¶ú‡¶®‡ßç‡¶Ø ‡¶™‡¶∞‡¶æ‡¶Æ‡¶∞‡ßç‡¶∂ ‚Äã

  1. ‡¶®‡¶§‡ßÅ‡¶® ‡¶´‡¶æ‡¶á‡¶≤ ‡¶§‡ßà‡¶∞‡¶ø ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡ßá ‡¶¶‡ßá‡¶ñ‡ßÅ‡¶® git status ‡¶ï‡¶ø‡¶≠‡¶æ‡¶¨‡ßá ‡¶∞‡¶ø‡¶™‡ßã‡¶∞‡ßç‡¶ü ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡ßá
  2. ‡¶è‡¶ï‡¶á ‡¶´‡¶æ‡¶á‡¶≤‡ßá ‡¶è‡¶ï‡¶æ‡¶ß‡¶ø‡¶ï ‡¶¨‡¶æ‡¶∞ ‡¶™‡¶∞‡¶ø‡¶¨‡¶∞‡ßç‡¶§‡¶® ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡ßá ‡¶∏‡ßç‡¶ü‡ßá‡¶ú ‡¶ì unstaged ‡¶Ö‡¶¨‡¶∏‡ßç‡¶•‡¶æ ‡¶¨‡ßÅ‡¶ù‡ßÅ‡¶®
  3. ‡¶∏‡ßç‡¶ü‡ßá‡¶ú ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡ßá ‡¶Ü‡¶¨‡¶æ‡¶∞ git restore --staged ‡¶¶‡¶ø‡ßü‡ßá ‡¶∏‡ßç‡¶ü‡ßá‡¶ú ‡¶Æ‡ßÅ‡¶õ‡ßá ‡¶¶‡¶ø‡¶®
  4. .gitignore ‡¶´‡¶æ‡¶á‡¶≤ ‡¶¶‡¶ø‡ßü‡ßá ‡¶ï‡¶ø‡¶õ‡ßÅ ‡¶´‡¶æ‡¶á‡¶≤ ‡¶¨‡¶æ‡¶¶ ‡¶¶‡¶ø‡¶®

üéØ ‡¶∏‡¶Ç‡¶ï‡ßç‡¶∑‡ßá‡¶™‡ßá ‡¶Æ‡¶®‡ßá ‡¶∞‡¶æ‡¶ñ‡ßÅ‡¶® ‚Äã

‡¶Ö‡¶¨‡¶∏‡ßç‡¶•‡¶æ git status ‡¶è ‡¶ï‡ßÄ ‡¶¶‡ßá‡¶ñ‡¶æ‡ßü
‡¶®‡¶§‡ßÅ‡¶® ‡¶´‡¶æ‡¶á‡¶≤ Untracked files
‡¶™‡¶∞‡¶ø‡¶¨‡¶∞‡ßç‡¶§‡¶ø‡¶§ ‡¶ï‡¶ø‡¶®‡ßç‡¶§‡ßÅ unstaged Changes not staged for commit
‡¶∏‡ßç‡¶ü‡ßá‡¶ú ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶æ ‡¶™‡¶∞‡¶ø‡¶¨‡¶∞‡ßç‡¶§‡¶® Changes to be committed
‡¶´‡¶æ‡¶á‡¶≤ ‡¶Æ‡ßÅ‡¶õ‡ßá ‡¶´‡ßá‡¶≤‡¶æ deleted:
‡¶´‡¶æ‡¶á‡¶≤ ‡¶∞‡¶ø‡¶®‡ßá‡¶Æ ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶æ renamed:

üîö ‡¶â‡¶™‡¶∏‡¶Ç‡¶π‡¶æ‡¶∞ ‚Äã

git status ‡¶π‡¶≤‡ßã ‡¶Ü‡¶™‡¶®‡¶æ‡¶∞ Git ‡¶™‡ßç‡¶∞‡¶ú‡ßá‡¶ï‡ßç‡¶ü‡ßá‡¶∞ ‡¶¨‡¶∞‡ßç‡¶§‡¶Æ‡¶æ‡¶® ‡¶ö‡¶ø‡¶§‡ßç‡¶∞‡•§ ‡¶è‡¶ü‡¶ø ‡¶®‡¶ø‡ßü‡¶Æ‡¶ø‡¶§ ‡¶ö‡¶æ‡¶≤‡¶ø‡ßü‡ßá ‡¶ó‡ßá‡¶≤‡ßá ‡¶≠‡ßÅ‡¶≤ ‡¶ï‡¶Æ ‡¶π‡¶¨‡ßá, ‡¶∏‡¶Æ‡ßü ‡¶¨‡¶æ‡¶Å‡¶ö‡¶¨‡ßá, ‡¶è‡¶¨‡¶Ç ‡¶Ü‡¶§‡ßç‡¶Æ‡¶¨‡¶ø‡¶∂‡ßç‡¶¨‡¶æ‡¶∏ ‡¶¨‡¶æ‡ßú‡¶¨‡ßá‡•§
